subject: Olympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Steroids
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: A Norwegian rider, Tony Andre Hansen, was stripped of his Olympic bronze medal in team jumping after his horse tested positive for a banned drug at the Beijing Games.
snippet: A Norwegian rider, Tony Andre Hansen, was stripped of his Olympic bronze medal in team jumping after his horse tested positive for a banned drug at the Beijing Games.
